text: Ticket type 'Advance' costs £20. It's valid for specific trains only, no refunds available after booking.
Ticket type 'Standard Class' costs £35. It's valid for any train on the specified route, with a refund option available before departure.
Ticket type 'First Class' costs £100. It's valid for any train within the selected route, and is refundable with a £10 fee before departure.

metadata.refund_policy: Refundable with a £10 fee before departure

text: Ticket type 'Off-Peak' costs £40. Valid only on off-peak services. No refunds after departure.
Ticket type 'Anytime' costs £60. Valid for any train at any time, refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Group Save' costs £120 for a group of 4 people. Valid for off-peak services only, no refunds after booking.
Ticket type 'Family & Friends' costs £50. Valid for any off-peak service for a family group of up to 4 people. Refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Super Off-Peak' costs £25. Valid for any off-peak service, no refunds after departure.
Ticket type 'Senior Railcard' costs £30 for one year. Discounted fares available for seniors, no refunds after booking.
Ticket type 'Student Railcard' costs £30 for one year. Discounted fares for students, refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Child Ticket' costs £15. Valid for children aged 5 to 15. Non-refundable after booking.
Ticket type 'Weekend Travelcard' costs £45. Valid for unlimited travel over the weekend. Non-refundable after booking.
Ticket type 'Advance Saver' costs £15. Valid for specific trains, no refunds after booking.
Ticket type 'Last Minute' costs £80. Valid for any train on the specified route, refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Off-Peak Day Return' costs £30. Valid for off-peak return travel on the specified route. Refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Super Off-Peak Day Return' costs £20. Valid for return travel on off-peak services. No refunds after booking.
Ticket type 'First Class Anytime' costs £150. Valid for any train at any time, refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Business Premier' costs £250. Valid for First Class services, refundable with a £30 fee before departure.

metadata.refund_policy: Refundable with a £30 fee before departure

text: Ticket type 'Group Day Return' costs £100 for a group of 4. Valid for any return journey on the specified route. Refundable before departure.
Ticket type 'Annual Travelcard' costs £550. Valid for unlimited travel throughout the year. Refundable with a £50 fee before departure.

metadata.refund_policy: Refundable with a £50 fee before departure
